game_info.name: Brotato Clone
game_info.description: Wave-based arena survivor with auto-aim weapons, shop between waves, and stat building.

core_loop.description: Survive enemy waves, collect XP/materials, shop between waves, upgrade stats.

primary_action.description: Weapons fire automatically at nearest enemy

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Move with WASD to dodge enemies. Weapons fire automatically. Collect drops and survive each wave.
